DOC.brief_summary: The purpose prospective study evaluate influence bundle knee stability - anterior-posterior translation , internal external rotation double-bundle reconstruction Anterior Cruciate Ligament compare stability single-bundle double-bundle reconstruction use computer navigation system .
DOC.brief_title: Stability Knee Joint After Single Double Bundle Anterior Cruciate Ligament Reconstruction
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose prospective study evaluate influence bundle knee stability - anterior-posterior translation , internal external rotation double-bundle reconstruction Anterior Cruciate Ligament ( ACL ) compare stability single-bundle double-bundle reconstruction use computer navigation system . Methods Anterior-posterior translation , internal rotation , external rotation record deficient condition ( without ACL ) , anteromedial-reconstructed , posterolateral-reconstructed , whole ACL-reconstructed condition double-bundle reconstruction ACL reconstruction single-bundle group . KT-1000 used evaluate anterior-posterior translation .
DOC.criteria: isolated ACL lesion primary ACL replacement replacement ACL navigation system
